invocations.description: Returns a table containing various information about rune rune which can be the spell name, cast area, damage type and other informations defined in the '/tibiadata/spells.xml' file.
invocations.ex:
local rune = runeinfo('avalanche rune')
for i,j in pairs(rune) do
	print(i, j)
end
invocations.exDescription: Will print all of the information the bot has about 'Avalanche Rune'.
